title: Torch of Revocation
content:
ishment

Torch of Revocation is a unique torch in Baldur's Gate 3. It is either given by Mystic Carrion after completing the quest Find Mystic Carrion's Servant, looted from the gilded chest behind him upon his defeat or stolen from the same gilded chest (DC25 Sleight of Hand) thereby bypassing both the aforementioned quest and combat.
